description:
Plane Watch is a web & mobile app for plane spotting enthusiasts so you can simply see what all planes are flying around you at the moment. You don't necessarily need a flight number to be able to track where your family and friends' flight is right now.
While they enjoy being in the 'airplane mode,' you can spot their plane on a Google map anytime!
Enjoy the experience of seeing what the pilot sees when flying! Imagine yourself to be one. Best piece of news: all of this is absolutely free!!! So get your app today.
App features:
1.	Spot planes with your phone
2.	Locate the planes flying around you
3.	Choose  flight to view info about it
4.	Track a specific flight on Google map
5.	Plane details include interesting info for you
6.	Fly with your loved ones with cockpit view
7.	View information about airports
* Free app to find planes around you & track them

title: Plane Watch
